mapper.insert: insert into db_tempsavenum (PRODUCTID, OPER, PURCHASEOPER, NEXTOPER, SAVENUM, PURCHASENUM, NEXTNUM, OPERTIME, NEXTOPERTIME, PURCHSEOPERTIME, FLAG, CHECKNUM, NEXTDESCR, PURCHASEDESCR, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR) values (#{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{purchaseoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{savenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{purchasenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nextopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{purchseopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checknum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{nextdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{purchasedescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PRODUCTID, OPER, PURCHASEOPER, NEXTOPER, SAVENUM, PURCHASENUM, NEXTNUM, OPERTIME, NEXTOPERTIME, PURCHSEOPERTIME, FLAG, CHECKNUM, NEXTDESCR, PURCHASEDESCR, PRODUCTNAME, DESCR from db_tempsavenum
